name: Triangle Of Triumph
description:
This game is a two player competitive strategy game (aka. we didn't managed to finish the AI). You control your army and try to defeat the army of the other player.

Rules:

  • Each player can move all their units during their turn. Once all your units have acted it is the other player turn.
  • Move your unit next to an enemy unit to attack them. The more HP your unit has, the more damage it will deal. If the enemy you attack is not defeated, it will counterattack.
  • The game ends when a player loses all their units.

Weapon Triangle:

  • Archer is strong versus Lancer
  • Lancer is strong versus Horse Knight
  • Horse Knight is strong versus Archer

Controllers: 

  • Move cursor with WASD or Arrows
  • Select with E
  • Cancel selection with R
